review_title: Medical Training College - A great place to work
job_title: Admissions Representative in Baton Rouge, LA
pros: Monday - Friday 8-5 with one hour unpaid break. Good amount of vacation and sick days. Very flexible with your schedule for doctor appts, being late, leaving early or taking a long break. Good health benefits. Close to highway so easy access. Small school. Nice staff. Great director. Great length off for holidays such as Christmas.
cons: No fridge to keep your lunch. Raises are hard to come by so try to start with a higher salary. They do not come yearly or quarterly as expected. Due to regulations, no commission or bonuses are given. Not really a set, good training program for new staff. Must wear a uniform shirt provided by school every day (I like but some people don't like uniforms). A lot of turnaround in certain departments.

pros: Standard schedule. No oversight at all.
cons: Poorly run. Hard to run things by admin. No oversight at all.
